gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 110, Wizards 102
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Wizards, 110-102 to improve to 26-23. Jimmy Butler led Miami with 24 points and nine rebounds as Bam Adebayo totaled 20 points and 14 rebounds. Corey Kispert led the Wizards with 26 points (6-14 3PT) as Jordan Poole added 16 points and 10 assists. The Wizards move to 9-39 on the year.
